plugin.name: dojo
plugin.author: Rob Meidal
plugin.title: Dojo 1.4.3 for Grails
plugin.description: Adds Dojo Base as a Javascript Provider for Grails. This provides full support for <g:formRemote>, <g:remoteField>, <g:remoteFunction>, <g:remoteLink> and <g:submitToRemote>. For more information about the Dojo Toolkit please visit http://www.dojotoolkit.org/.
